name: OBSOLESCENCE
description:
You, an obsolete android, have been scrapped.  Now find a way to freedom!  Use the power of Nodes to ADHOC into other androids in this tribute to the original GameBoy!

*UPDATE* Game should have the proper ending now!

mod credits:

All mod files come from modarchive.org

mod files:

alone- Alfons

baroque oldfield - weasel

alpha_c_-xmas - Alpha C

plink - walkman

prelude - Clyde of Triumph

dune_wormsign - WORMSIGN - (not sure of the artist, reach out to me so I can fix this)

bright darkness - Ghidorah

80s.chip - Strobo
